title: Connection problem!!
body:
I just got disconnected mid-game for no reason. The client works fine, but if I try re-entering the game it says "unable to connect to the network, please check your network settings and try again." I tried disabling firewall both on my PC and on my router, opening league as an administrator, resetting my connection.. Nothing works!! But my internet is fine! What the hell is going on? Also, it's sporadic. It happens sometimes, but not others. But no matter what, once I've randomly been disconnected from the game, there's no getting back in. HELP

I don't want to be punish for something I can't control. Help me control it
